amendment.description: To allow the Secretary of Homeland Security flexibility in determining priorities for firefighting vehicles in the Firefighter Assistance Grants program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1381 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1381 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S9871-9872; text: CR S9871) To allow the Secretary of Homeland Security flexibility in determining priorities for firefighting vehicles in the Firefighter Assistance Grants program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1381 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1381 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Akaka.
